titleStmt.title: A monumental columne, erected to the liuing memory of the euer-glorious Henry, late Prince of Wales. . . By Iohn Webster
titleStmt.author: Webster, John, 1580?-1625?
Tourneur, Cyril, 1575?-1626. Three elegies.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. O[kes] for William Welby, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Swan,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A funerall elegie.
Also issued as part 2 of STC 24151: Cyril Tourneur. Three elegies on the most lamented death of Prince Henrie, 1613.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Swan
